com.lightyosft.logmx.gotosource.business

Class SourcePreview

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lightyosft.logmx.gotosource.business.SourcePreview

  • public class SourcePreview
extends Object
    Preview of a source code (excerpt), optionally with a highlighted line

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int lineToHighlight
      Index of the line to highlight in LogMX, or -1 if unknown (first line is 1)
      boolean ok
      Flag indicating if the source code is available in this object (false if the source code couldn't be retrieved)
      static int PREVIEW_LINES_RANGE
      Number of lines that should be displayed before and after the line to highlight (PREVIEW_LINES_RANGE lines before and PREVIEW_LINES_RANGE lines after)
      String text
      Lines of source code, or error message if attribute ok is false

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SourcePreview()
      Empty default constructor
      SourcePreview(boolean pOk, String pText, int pLineToHighlight)
      Create a SourcePreview with a value for each of its attributes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SourcePreview fromString(String pStr)
      Creates a SourcePreview from a string.
      The given string must match the pattern
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ok

        public boolean ok
        Flag indicating if the source code is available in this object (false if the source code couldn't be retrieved)

      • text

        public String text
        Lines of source code, or error message if attribute ok is false

      • lineToHighlight

        public int lineToHighlight
        Index of the line to highlight in LogMX, or -1 if unknown (first line is 1)

      • PREVIEW_LINES_RANGE

        public static final int PREVIEW_LINES_RANGE
        Number of lines that should be displayed before and after the line to highlight (PREVIEW_LINES_RANGE lines before and PREVIEW_LINES_RANGE lines after)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SourcePreview

        public SourcePreview()
        Empty default constructor

      • SourcePreview

        public SourcePreview(boolean pOk,
             String pText,
             int pLineToHighlight)
        Create a SourcePreview with a value for each of its attributes
        Parameters:
        pOk - true if pText contains the actual source code, or false if the source code couldn't be retrieved (in this case, an error message may be specified using pText)
        pText - Source code excerpt (if pOk == true) or error message if (pOk == false)
        pLineToHighlight - Index of the line to highlight in LogMX, or -1 if unknown (first line is 1)

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • fromString

        public static SourcePreview fromString(String pStr)
        Creates a SourcePreview from a string.
        The given string must match the pattern 
        "return_code;num_line_to_highlight;source_code"
        Parameters:
        pStr - String describing a SourcePreview
        Returns:
        SourcePreview created from the given string
